Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Netherworld Lane, just east of Leviathan Way.
Room.LongDescription: On the south side of the road, you can see the Riverdell Tranquility Park and the Riverdell Center for Tracking Training. Being as large as it is, the Riverdell Park is ideal for studying the skills of tracking and searching in the rather dense woods. On the north side of the road is the Rodaisl Community Housing Complex, where numerous Oceancrest residents live. There are no houses within the city, so if people wish to live inside the city, they must live in one of the housing complexes.
